creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
The shipped INSTALL-SRC.TXT (lenya-1.2.x/INSTALL-SRC.txt) contains outdatet
install instructions.

File should be in sync with http://lenya.apache.org/installation/source_version.html
which needs some updating, too (see enhancement entry 32768)

creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
Created attachment 14183
Updates the Installation instructions INSTALL-SRC.txt

This is an abbreviated version of
http://lenya.apache.org/installation/source_version.html
with some small additions regarding some of the changes to
local.build.properties.

creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
Created attachment 14188
Improved patch to INSTALL-SRC.txt

Previous patch didn't work properly due to some encoding problems (first time
windows user). Back to the Mac, here is it again, this time incorporating build
clean instead of build reset.
